add-novo-cartao: You don't have any registered cards
esse-novo-cartao: The card will be saved for all subsequent months
essa-nova-divida: Click on the option that best fits your type of debt to save
esse-cartao-sera-removido: The card will be deleted from all subsequent months
voce-ainda-nao-tem-catoes-adicionados:
You don't have any cards or debts added yet!!
Click here to add
adicione-valor-total-descontado: Add the total value to be deducted
digite-saldo-que-sera-descontado: Enter the balance to which the value of this month will be deducted:
para-permitir-que-o-payplan: To enable Payplan to deliver personalized notifications, it is necessary to allow notifications in the settings.
para-permitir-que-o-payplan-admob: To enable Payplan to deliver personalized ads, it is necessary to allow Tracking in the settings.
nao-perca-data-pagamento: Don't miss the payment due date of your invoice.
